title: Timewinder  RANGE: 1075 COST: 60 / 70 / 80 / 90 / 100 Mana COOLDOWN: 11 / 10 / 9 / 8 / 7
body:
Burnout  COOLDOWN: 12 .

How am I meant to trade with Ekko - who is an Assassin, AP and Fighter as a Tank/Fighter - Shyvana, when his primary deterrent to engages is 11/10/9/8/7 seconds and my primary method of engagement, my sole form of any form of trading capability to set up Q's and/or E's is on a 12 second cooldown?

2:

How am I meant to trade with Ekko when my primary and only form of engaging - as a Tank fighter - Shen, is on a 16 / 14 / 12 / 10 / 8 second cooldown - as my only method of dealing with or countering his movespeed during what will be an engage in which I trade my skills for his - without him running away from auto-attack range after i Q him?

3:
How am I meant to trade with Ekko, when my primary and only form of CC - Counter strike - is on a 16 / 14 / 12 / 10 / 8  second cooldown; I can't actually CC him through the duration of his shield so he absorbs my engages.

He is only vulnerable when Parralel convergence is down, which is a relatively short cooldown; and his main weakness is his mana costs - however he has a ranged CC that deters chases and a dash and his AP scaling is huge - so he has a relatively safe time early game and is basically impossible to gank after the 12 minute mark and scales into late game hugely.

I haven't versed him enough times mid lane, but he is basically impossible to gank and this represents a problem when a Champion has AP scaling as high as his, is as mobile as he is, deals as much sustained damage as he does and can counter burst as effectively as he does.

He takes the entire team to burst down and if you don't have enough CC all that effort is wasted and he'll just ult out or ult into you or ult on the spot and instantly turn a team fight - which for someone with as strong and safe an engage or mid-engage as he does is basically impossible to deal with - not to mention there are no good items for dealing with sustained AP damage which is why Sejuani and Gragas are OP and this Champion is just going to be a problem until he gets nerfed into the ground because he can go any lane - making him difficult to counter and his entire concept is : "ungankable damage dealer" which is broken OP.
